allow: Bash(find components -name "*.tsx" -type f ! -name "*.stories.tsx" ! -name "*.test.tsx" -exec sh -c 'file=""""$1""""; imports=$(grep """"^import.*from"""" """"$file"""" | grep -v """"@/"""" | grep -v """"react"""" | grep -v """"framer-motion"""" | grep -v """"lucide-react"""" | grep -v """"clsx"""" | grep -v """"class-variance-authority"""" | grep -v """"\\.types"""" | grep -v """"''''\\./index''''"""" | wc -l); if [ """"$imports"""" -gt 0 ]; then echo """"$file""""; grep """"^import.*from"""" """"$file"""" | grep -v """"@/"""" | grep -v """"react"""" | grep -v """"framer-motion"""" | grep -v """"lucide-react"""" | grep -v """"clsx"""" | grep -v """"class-variance-authority"""" | grep -v """"\\.types"""" | grep -v """"''''\\./index''''""""; fi' _ {})
